name: Fraz-Urb\'luu
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
CR: 23 (50,000 XP) or 24 (62,000 XP) when encountered in lair

traits.Legendary Resistance (3/Day): If Fraz-Urb'luu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.
traits.Magic Resistance: Fraz-Urb'luu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Undetectable: Fraz-Urb'luu can't be targeted by divination magic, perceived through magical scrying sensors, or detected by abilities that sense demons or fiends.

actions.Multiattack: Fraz-Urb'luu makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his fists.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +16+1d14 + 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage.
actions.Fist: Melee Weapon Attack: +16+1d14 + 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

options.Tail: Melee Weapon Attack: +16+1d14 + 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (2d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is also grappled (escape DC 24+1d14 + 17). The grappled target is also restrained. Fraz-Urb'luu can grapple only one creature with his tail at a time.
options.Phantasmal Killer (Costs 2 Actions): Fraz-Urb'luu casts phantasmal killer, no concentration required.

actions: Fraz-Urb'luu causes up to 5 doors within the lair to become walls, and an equal number of doors to appear on walls where there previously were none.

Fraz-Urb'luu chooses one humanoid within the lair and instantly creates a simulacrum of that creature (as if created with the simulacrum spell). This simulacrum obeys Fraz-Urb'luu's commands and is destroyed on the next initiative count 20.
Fraz-Urb'luu creates a wave of anguish. Each creature he can see within the lair must succeed on a DC 23+1d14 + 16 Wisdom saving throw or take 33 (6d10) psychic damage.
